Evaluate tracking results for the paper

"Detection- and Trajectory-Level Exclusion in Multiple Object Tracking". 
A. Milan, K. Schindler, and S. Roth
CVPR 2013

Note that the results for S2L2 and S1L2-1 reported in Table 2 of the paper are
evaluated with a wrong ground truth. This script produces the correct numbers.

To see the evaluation, run "evaluateCVPR2013" with the corresponding test sequence (seq).
